name: My Way .~
description:
A ragtag bunch of misfits have a band!

The song you can hear in the background is Punk Song by Hiro.

This bitsy was inspired by the following movie songs:

  • LINDA LINDA from LINDA LINDA LINDA.
  • Hata Sport from We are the Best!.
  • My Way from Swallowtail Butterfly.

I'm using bitsy by Adam Le Doux (Happy belated birthday, Adam!) with bitsy muse, exit from dialog, and end from dialog.

Special thanks to my friend lunafromthemoon for always showing me the best band movies ever =)
